text:
Hello there, I always get this weird error with the hs watch command and need to reauth several times a day:
```[ERROR] Uploading file xxx to xxx failed
[ERROR] Unable to upload "xxx. The post to "xxx" in account xxx was unauthorized. The OAuth token used to make this call expired 2 minute(s) ago.```
any tips what I can do to get rid of this error?
Thanks a ton
